Reviews.Title: dosent work
Reviews.Author: Tanisha Roberson
Reviews.Content: its not working the way i expected it to.it freezes all the time, cant work more than 5 minutes without freezing

Reviews.Title: Flimsy!!! Don't buy without the accidental damage protection.
Reviews.Author: Trucker Jim
Reviews.Content: These things will not hold up to even the mildest abuse.  My kid's school issued these cromebooks to all their students.  My Daughter broke hers display by placing it in her backpack with books.  My sons codebook the cover on the back is coming lose.  He has no idea why.  From what the school tells me they are having lots of problems with these pieces of junk.  Especially with the displays.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel  1.1 GHz
2 GB DDR3
16 GB Solid-State Drive
11.6-Inch Screen
Chrome
ProductInfo.Name: Acer NU.SH7AA.017;C710-2826 11.6-Inch Laptop
